turkish_example_sentence: Ben o zor kararı erken yapmışsam, işler daha iyi olurdu.
english_example_sentence: If I had made that difficult decision earlier, things would have been better.
russian_example_sentence: Если бы я принял то сложное решение раньше, дела пошли бы лучше.
